title: How can I transfer an iPhone iTunes back up to a new pixel phone?
content:
As my old iPhone 8 is now a dead powerless brick of metal and glass, I want to replace it with a Pixel 4a.  I have an iTunes back up of my old iPhone that I would like to use to setup the new Pixel phone.
So far every tutorial seems to rely on the use of an actual iPhone to setup the new pixel...
I find it rather counter productive to have to buy another iPhone in order to switch to a Pixel!
Any solution out there? I surely cannot be the only person in the world facing that problem...
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
